title: Belmont/Cragin 1 Bedroom On Wellington & Central
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   1 Bedroom Includes heat. Laundry facility on premises. Sunny living rooms, wood floors throughout, kitchen contains large roomy cabinets, remodeled kitchen & bath, walking distance to shops, grocery stores, restaurants and more!   1 Bedroom $950-$975.  Move in anytime June or July.   Application fee $65. No security deposit!   For more details and a showing please call or text Saida 1-773-407-6452 www.hunterprop.com   Hunter properties office 1-773-477-7070  Sample unit pictures!
